text.en: You are the great father who engenders all the victorious buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyalwa malü kyepé yab gyur kyang

text.en: Yet resolved to uphold the Buddhadharma in infinite realms
text.en-trans: gyalsé tsul gyi zhingkham rabjam su

text.en: As a bodhisattva heir to the victors—through the power of this truth,
text.en-trans: gyalwé chö dzin tukkyé denpé tü

text.en: May the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Long ago, in the presence of Indraketu,
text.en-trans: ngöntsé wangwö tok gi chen nga ru

text.en: You made your vow, and the buddhas and their bodhisattva heirs
text.en-trans: damché tsé na nyingtob chenpo zhé

text.en: Praised your great courage—through the power of this truth,
text.en-trans: sé ché gyalwé ngak jö denpé tü

text.en: May the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: So that the lineage of pure view and conduct might develop,
text.en-trans: tachö tsangmé gyüpa pelwé chir

text.en: You presented a crystal rosary as an offering to Śākyamuni,
text.en-trans: tubpé drung du shel kar trengwa pul

text.en: Who gave you a dharma conch and prophesied your future—through the power of this truth,
text.en-trans: chö dung nang zhing lungten denpé tü

text.en: May the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Pure in your view, free from the extremes of eternalism and nihilism;
text.en-trans: tawa namdak takché ta lé drol

text.en: Pure in your meditation, undimmed by lethargy and dullness;
text.en-trans: gompa namdak jing muk münpa sang

text.en: Pure in your conduct, acting in accordance with Buddha’s words;
text.en-trans: chöpa namdak gyalwé ka zhin drub

text.en: May the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Learned, due to your vast study and extensive enquiry,
text.en-trans: mangdu töpa gyacher tsalwé khé

text.en: Venerable, through having applied the points of study to your character,
text.en-trans: tö dön jizhin gyü la jarwé tsün

text.en: Kind-hearted, due to dedicating all towards the teachings and beings—
text.en-trans: kün kyang ten drö döndu ngowé zang

text.en: May the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: In your certainty that all teachings, provisional and definitive,
text.en-trans: drang ngé sung rab malü galmé du

text.en: Are practical instructions applicable to the individual,
text.en-trans: gangzak chik gi nyamlen dampa ru

text.en: You eliminated all forms of unwholesome conduct—
text.en-trans: ngepa nyepé nyechö tadak gak

text.en: May the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You listened to explanations of the scriptural Dharma of the three collections,
text.en-trans: lung chödé nö sum gyi chenyen dang

text.en: Practised the three trainings, the doctrine of realization,
text.en-trans: tokpé tenpa lab sum nyamlen té

text.en: And set a wondrous example of life-long learning and accomplishment—
text.en-trans: khé shing drubpé namtar mé du jung

text.en: May the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Outwardly peaceful and subdued through the śrāvakas' conduct;
text.en-trans: chi ru nyentö chöpé zhi zhing dul

text.en: While inwardly possessing the assurance of the two-stage yoga;
text.en-trans: nang du rim nyi naljor deng dangden

text.en: You perfectly reconciled the excellent paths of sūtra and mantra—
text.en-trans: do ngak lamzang galmé drok su khyer

text.en: May the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: To combine the emptiness that is explained in the causal vehicle
text.en-trans: gyu yi tekpar shepé tongwa nyi

text.en: With the great bliss achieved through the fruitional vehicle’s methods
text.en-trans: drebü tab kyi drubpé dechen dang

text.en: Is the very heart and quintessence of the eighty-four thousand sections of Dharma—
text.en-trans: nyamjor chö pung gyé tri nyingwö chü

text.en: May the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Chief among the guardians of the paths of the three types of individual—
text.en-trans: kyebu sum gyi lam gyi sungmé tso

text.en: Mahākāla who is swift to act, Vaiśravaṇa, Kālarūpa and the rest—1
text.en-trans: nyur dzé gön dang namsé lé shin sok

text.en: Through the power and strength of an ocean of oath-bound Dharma guardians,
text.en-trans: tensung damchen gyatsö tutob kyi

text.en: May the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: In short, may the lives of the glorious masters be secure,
text.en-trans: dorna palden lamé kutsé ten

text.en: May the world be filled with learned, venerable holders of the teachings,
text.en-trans: khé tsün tendzin dampé sateng gang

text.en: And may the power and influence of Dharma benefactors increase,
text.en-trans: tenpé jindak ngatang darwa yi

text.en: So that the victorious Lobzang Drakpa's teachings flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: lobzang gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik
